transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Thank you for calling Premier Card Services. My name is Darren. How can I help you today?

transcript.speaker: customer
transcript.text: Hello, I'm calling about a recent transaction on my card.

transcript.speaker: customer
transcript.text: I need assistance due to my disability

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Thank you for letting me know. I'll make sure to speak clearly and slowly.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: You're welcome. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
